verses.text: \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, how \w my|strong="H1732"\w* adversaries \w have|strong="H1121"\w* increased! Many \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w those|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* rise \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* say \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul, “\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H6965"\w* \w help|strong="H6965"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.”\f + \fr 3:2 \ft The Hebrew word rendered “God” is “\+wh אֱלֹהִ֑ים\+wh*” (Elohim).\f* \qs Selah.\qs*

\w But|strong="H7227"\w* \w you|strong="H5315"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shield around \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w my|strong="H5315"\w* glory, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3444"\w* \w one|strong="H7227"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* lifts up \w my|strong="H5315"\w* head.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* answers \w me|strong="H1157"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy hill. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* laid myself \w down|strong="H7121"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* slept. \w I|strong="H3068"\w* awakened, \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* sustains \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* afraid \w of|strong="H3068"\w* tens \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thousands \w of|strong="H3068"\w* people \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H5564"\w* themselves \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3068"\w* side.

Arise, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! Save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*! \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* struck \w all|strong="H5439"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* enemies \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cheek bone. \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* broken \w the|strong="H5921"\w* teeth \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wicked.

\w Salvation|strong="H3467"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* blessing \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H7563"\w*. \qs Selah.\qs*
